Job Description

Description:
  • Perform remediation of data acquisition software for analytical instrumentation to meet data integrity requirements.
  • Perform and document software data integrity risk assessments.
  • Work with instrument SMEs to configure software
  • Create requirements documents
  • Author and execute validation protocols.
  • Author validation reports.
  • Bachelors Degree is preferred.
  • 5 years Pharmaceutical experience.
  • Communication, attention to detail, lab experience, regulatory requirements.
